programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan
programme.desc: When the principal pays a visit to the students of the kindergarten, Shin-chan asks him to sing a song. Later, the principal intervenes when Shin-chan kicks an empty can.

programme.title: Shin Chan
programme.desc: After helping his mother Misae with a myriad of houseold chores, Shin-chan draws on her face with permanent ink when she falls asleep.

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan
programme.desc: Shin-chan tries to offer his assistance to Misae in preparing their meals for dinner. However, his participation complicates the situation.

programme.title: Shin Chan
programme.desc: Shin-chan brushes his teeth with new toothpaste and eats unhealthy snacks right after. As a result, Misae is left infuriated and she berates him.

programme.title: Shin Chan
programme.desc: When Misae punishes Shin-chan by making him stay outside, he sneaks in to watch Action Mask. Later, he hides to avoid being scolded by Misae.

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan
programme.desc: Shin-chan visits a restaurant where Shinobu is employed and offers a handwritten note in exhange for a burger. As a result, the manager berates Shinobu.

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.title: Shin Chan

programme.desc: In order to punish Bhide for his absent-mindedness, Popatlal decides to teach him a lesson. So, he hides Bhide's favourite scooter, Sakharam, in a remote corner of the colony.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The members of Gokuldham colony celebrate at Abdul's shop. Later, Popatlal turns up in a fancy car and is seen conversing with a suspicious person and looking nervous.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Inspector Pandey tries to take Champaklal to the hospital, the members of the society react against it. Later, the police set out to find Popatlal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Inspector Pandey sets out to locate and apprehend Popatlal and decides to search for him in every place he could have visited.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Inspector Pandey along with the inhabitants of Gokuldham colony are actively searching for Popatlal but they are having a hard time finding him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While inspector Pandey continues his search for Popatlal in the colony, Popatlal hides inside Bhide's house, causing problems for him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After a long search, Popatlal is found hiding in his closet. When questioned about his disappearance, he opens up about how overwhelmingly stressed and anxious he was feeling.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone is happy to see that Popatlal is now relaxed and tension-free. In addition to this, an exciting wedding opportunity presents itself to Popatlal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal becomes more impatient by the minute as he waits for Inspector Pandey to call and confirm whether his and the girl's horoscope matches.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While on a phone call with Atmaram, Champaklal informs him that he, Jethalal and Abdul are ready to greet Madhubala and her family. In response, Atmaram asks him to not let Jethalal speak much.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal's wait may finally be over as he meets the girl and her family, accompanied by Inspector Pandey and his wife. Will this meeting seal the deal and lead to a long-awaited wedding?

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Inspector Pandey thoroughly questions Popatlal on several matters before revealing the bride's decision.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Popatlal spirals into negative thoughts, some society members offer comfort while others, with good intentions, compile a list of important questions for him to ask Madhubala.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal decides to finally come clean with his potential bride and tell her everything honestly without knowing how she would react.

programme.title: Gatha Shiv Parivaar Ki Ganesh Kartikey

programme.title: Gatha Shiv Parivaar Ki Ganesh Kartikey
